value:
$WmMPID_海賊リフィス,ch07_16_Rifis_M_Pirate21,Face|A pirate festival, is it? Heh heh...
That must make me the festival
king, being a real pirate and all.$k$pSurely everyone else is no more
than a weakling in costume!$k$pI suppose I ought to impress upon
these fools the strength I wield!$k$pFirst impressions are important,
after all.$k$p...That being said, my appearance
is not all too impressive by myself.$k$pTime to gather a few simple-minded
henchmen types!$k$p

$WmMPID_海賊リフィス,ch07_16_Rifis_M_Pirate21,Face|Hmm... Those fellows look like they
know how to swing a sword...
Right then...$k$pHey, you!  I'm your new captain
starting today. From now on, you
do as I order!$k$p$WmMPID_海賊ネサラ,ch11_06_Naesala_M_Pirate21,Face|Hm? What's all this squawking?$k$p$WmMPID_海賊スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Pirate21,Face|Say that again, boy.$k$p$WmMPID_海賊リフィス,ch07_16_Rifis_M_Pirate21,Face|...Ergh!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_海賊リフィス,ch07_16_Rifis_M_Pirate21,Face|Oh no! I, er... Excuse me!
I'll be going now!$k$p$Sbs150|
